titleStmt.title: Saul at Endor: or, The ghost of the Marquiss de Louvois consulted by the French King concerning present affairs. Done out of French

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Baldwin near the Oxford Arms in Warwick Lane,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 1 reads: Saul and the witch of Endor: or, Monsieur de Louvois his ghost consulted by the French King.
With a final page of advertisement.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Oxford Arms in Warwick Lane
